ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: it truly is one of the greatest of all things,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That (Hell) is surely one of the greater (signs),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: surely (Hell) is one of the greatest Signs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: hell is certainly the greatest calamity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed hell is one of the greatest entities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it is but one of the greatest (signs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it (hell) is one of the gravest (misfortunes),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely it is one of the greatest things
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! this is one of the greatest (portents)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, it is one of the gravest things,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily it is one of the greatest woes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they are one of the greatest [signs of God]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is but one of the mighty (portents),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, it (Hell, or their denial of the Prophet Muhammad SAW, or the Day of Resurrection) is but one of the greatest calamities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: it is one of the greatest trials,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is one of the greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:35] Verily it, that is, Saqar, is one of the enormities, [one of] the greatest calamities —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! this is) i.e. Saqar (one of the greatest (portents)) this is one of the gates of the Fire; other gates include: Jahannam, Laza, al-Hutamah, al-Sa'ir, al-Jahim, and al-Hawiyah.
